mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CNO, MID, PNO, CAMOUNT, CSIZE) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mId}, #{pNo}, #{cAmount}, #{cSize})
mapper.select:
SELECT MIN(C.CNO) CNO, C.MID, C.PNO, SUM(C.CAMOUNT) CAMOUNT, C.CSIZE, P.PPRICE, P.PNAME, P.PFILENAME, P.PDISRATE
FROM CART C, PRODUCTS P, MEMBERS M WHERE M.MID=C.MID AND C.PNO=P.PNO AND C.MID = #{param1} GROUP BY C.MID, C.PNO, C.CSIZE, P.PPRICE, P.PNAME, P.PFILENAME, P.PDISRATE ORDER BY CNO
SELECT P.PNO, C.MID, PNAME, PBRAND, CAMOUNT, CSIZE, PPRICE, P.PFILENAME, P.PDISRATE FROM CART C, PRODUCTS P WHERE CNO = #{cNo} AND C.PNO = P.PNO
